price: "Quando morrermos e formos pó, ressuscitaremos? Esse é um retorno distante!"
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
